title: Global mobile video traffic 2017 to 2022
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Traffic in PB per month. In total the number of data points it has is 6.
In general Traffic in PB per month has rose over the Year.
Traffic in PB per month is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2022.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2021 and 2022.
The highest Traffic in PB per month, of value 60889.0 was reached at Year 2022
The lowest Traffic in PB per month, of value 6821.0 was reported at Year 2017
